title: LB's clone does no damage?.... yea about that...
body:
Not quite sure what to make of this, I'm unimpressed to say the least. 

PS: Also not being able to attach images anymore is complete BS, if you don't mind me being frank.

replies.body:
Death recap says it was minion damage. Minions do physical damage and nothing else, so since the damage was not mixed that rules out any on-hit effects that might have been added to the clone that I can think of.

Based on the damage of LB compared to the minion damage, you fought too close to the minion wave and they messed you up.

Minion damage with a graphical glitch showing the champion portrait twice, caused by the still buggy death recap system. Case closed.

Did you have a nami on our team? Her 'w' passive empowers allies auto attacks. If she used it on the lb clone that would explain it. But from memory the kill/assist is given to nami, not the clone. Not quite sure, could just be a bug.

It's not Nami, her **Tidecaller's Blessing** deals magic damage not physical damage.

Might just be a visual glitch? Were there normal minions attacking?
